content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 5, Leicester City 1.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 5, Leicester City 1.
Foul by Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City).
Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Wilfred Ndidi with a cross.
Goal!  Manchester City 5, Leicester City 1. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Phil Foden.
Harry Maguire (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Harry Maguire (Leicester City).

Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card.
